member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam
member.summary: Defines a class that represents a single parameter used in constructors of dependency injection services.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the constructor parameter.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of the constructor parameter.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam.Value
member.summary: Gets the value of the constructor parameter.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: Specifies an XML node based on which to initialize the instance.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam.RunRegexValidation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Runs a regex pattern validation for a value.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam.SetTypeAndValue(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Initializes the type and value fields based on a specified XML node.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam.m_name
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam.m_type
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParam.m_value
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParamException
member.summary: This exception will be thrown whenever an error related to a constructor parameter of a dependency injection service occurs.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ConstructorParamException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.summary: See .

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Services.LibraryMessages
member.summary: A static class that defines the diagnostic messages for this library.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.LibraryMessages.MessageFactory
member.summary: Gets the instance for creating diagnostic messages.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.LibraryMessages.Error001
member.summary: No dependency injection service was found with the identifier '{0}'.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.LibraryMessages.Error002
member.summary: Constructor parameter '{0}' could not be initialized.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.LibraryMessages.Error003
member.summary: Value '{0}' of the constructor parameter '{1}' is not a valid '{2}' parameter value.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.LibraryMessages.Error004
member.summary: An instance of the dependency injection service '{0}' could not be created.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.LibraryMessages.Error005
member.summary: Dependency injection service '{0}' could not be initialized.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.LibraryMessages.Error006
member.summary: Dependency injection service '{0}' has a duplicate definition in the configuration.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Services.Service
member.summary: Defines a class that encapsulates the metadata of a dependency injection service.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.CreateInstance``1
member.summary: Creates an instance of the encapsulated dependency injection service.
member.returns: Returns the created instance casted to the specified service type.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.ClassId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the class that implements the dependency injection service.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.ConstructorParams
member.summary: Gets an array of objects specifying the constructor parameters for the dependency injection service. Can be null.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.Id
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the dependency injection service.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.#ctor(Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory,System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: Specifies a object that will be set to own the instance.
Specifies a service XML node based on which to initialize the instance.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.GetConstructorParams
member.summary: Gets an array of the constructor parameter objects required for creating an instance of the service.
member.returns: Returns an array of the required constructor parameter objects.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.m_classId
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.m_constructorParams
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.m_constructorParamObjs
member.summary: Specifies an array of the constructor parameters for creating instances of the service. Can be null.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.m_hasServiceParams
member.summary: Specifies whether the constructor parameters of this service contain service type parameters.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.m_serviceFactory
member.summary: Specifies the object that owns this instance.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.Service.m_id
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceCreationException
member.summary: This exception will be thrown when an instance of a dependency injection service cannot be created.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceCreationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceCreationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: Specifies an object that relates to the error.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory
member.summary: Defines a class that provides methods for getting metadata and creating instances of the configured dependency injection services.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.CreateService``1
member.summary: Creates an instance of a dependency injection service corresponding to a specified service type.
member.returns: Returns the created instance casted to the specified service type.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.CreateService``1(Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a dependency injection service corresponding to a specified service identifier.
member.returns: Returns the created instance casted to the specified service type.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.CreateService``1(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a dependency injection service corresponding to a specified service name.
member.returns: Returns the created instance casted to the specified service type.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.CreateService``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a dependency injection service corresponding to a specified service identifier scheme and specifier.
member.returns: Returns the created instance casted to the specified service type.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.Services
member.summary: Gets an array of the instances created based on the configuration. The array is empty if there are no configured dependency injection services.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: Specifies a services XML node based on which to initialize the instance. Can be null.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.Close
member.summary: Closes this instance by releasing all the metadata related to the configured dependency injection services.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.CollectServiceNodes(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Xml.XmlNode})
member.summary: Collects recursively service XML nodes from a specified serviceGroup XML node.
member.param: Specifies a list of objects for storing the found service XML nodes.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.m_services
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceFactory.m_servicesById
member.summary: Specifies a collection of the instances indexed by identifier. The collection has been created based on the configuration.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId
member.summary: Defines an identifier class for dependency injection services. A service identifier consists of two parts, scheme and specifier, which are separated by a colon. Type binded services can be defined by the 'type' scheme and name binded by the 'name' scheme.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: Specifies a service identifier as a string.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.Scheme
member.summary: Gets the scheme part of the service identifier.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.Specifier
member.summary: Gets the specifier part of the service identifier.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.Value
member.summary: Gets the service identifier as a string.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.c_regexScheme
member.summary: Defines the regex for validating service ID schemes.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.c_regexServiceId
member.summary: Defines the regex for validating service IDs.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.c_regexSpecifier
member.summary: Defines the regex for validating service ID specifiers.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.c_schemeSpecifierSeparator
member.summary: Defines the separator character for the scheme and specifier parts in a service identifier.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.m_scheme
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.m_specifier
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Services.ServiceId.m_value
member.summary: Stores the property.
